examples: The girl wore a red skirt.
He was wearing a red jacket.

definitions.definition: Having an orange-brown or orange-blond colour; ginger .
Having a redder hue than usual due to embarrassment , anger , sunburn , etc.; flushed .

labels: of a dog or its coat
definitions.label_groups: of a dog or its coat

definitions.definition: Of the hearts or diamonds suits. Compare black ( “ of the spades or clubs suits ” )
examples: I got two red queens, and he got one of the black queens.

definitions.definition: Supportive of, related to, or dominated by a political party or movement represented by the color red:

subdefinitions.definition: Left-wing parties and movements, chiefly socialist or communist , including the U.K. Labour party and the Social Democratic Party of Germany .
examples: the red -black grand coalition in Germany

definitions.definition: Amerind ; relating to Amerindians or First Nations .
Of the lower-frequency region of the (typically visible) part of the electromagnetic spectrum which is relevant in the specific observation.

secondary_definitions: ( of hair ) Having an orange-brown or orange-blond colour; ginger .
( of the skin ) Having a redder hue than usual due to embarrassment , anger , sunburn , etc.; flushed .
( of a dog or its coat ) Having a brown color.
( card games , of a card ) Of the hearts or diamonds suits. Compare black ( “ of the spades or clubs suits ” )
( politics , often capitalized ) Supportive of, related to, or dominated by a political party or movement represented by the color red:
( chiefly derogatory , offensive ) Amerind ; relating to Amerindians or First Nations .
( astronomy ) Of the lower-frequency region of the (typically visible) part of the electromagnetic spectrum which is relevant in the specific observation.
( particle physics ) Of a red color charge .
